title: White Horse Wood Country Park Walking Route

images.caption: The entrance to the park off the A249. The trees behind the sign were planted in 2006. The sculptures on the left are carved from tree trunks.

description: Enjoy fabulous views over the Kent Downs AONB in this new country park near Maidstone. The park contains well surfaced walking trails taking you through grassland and woodland. It also includes the medieval ruins of Thurnham castle, a splendid viewpoint at Detling Hill and traces of an Iron Age settlement. The North Downs Way passes the park so you could pick this and head east to the nearby Hucking Estate to extend your walk.
